```{r}
breast_exp_mean <- apply(breast_prism.exp, 2, mean)
```

```{r}

Wgene.krebs <- data.frame(row.names = names(w.genes.cancer), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

for (gene_name in names(w.genes.cancer)) {
  if (gene_name %in% colnames(breast_prism.exp)) {
    frequency_value <- hist.targets[hist.targets$genes == gene_name, "Freq"]
    achilles_value <- breast_achilles_mean[gene_name]
    exp_value <- breast_exp_mean[gene_name]
    new_row <- c(frequency_value, achilles_value, exp_value)
    Wgene.krebs[gene_name, ] <- new_row
  } else {
    warning(paste("Gene", gene_name, "does not exist in hist.targets or breast_prism.exp. Skipping."))
  }
}


View(Wgene.krebs)

#View(hist.targets)
```
